attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The link below explains the waste of £10,000 of N.H.S. money that could have been used on more deserving patients. The operation of fitting a gastric band was performed on Curtis Martin, a prisoner of 20 stone, convicted of being a drug dealer, who, following the operation, whilst on day release from prison, visited a cafe to have a fry up breakfast.

http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/top-stories/2010/01/09/20st-jailbird-has-10k-stomach-stapling-op-on-the-nhs-115875-21954897/
